```{python}
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.datasets import load_iris
from sklearn.linear_model import LogisticRegression


iris_data = load_iris()

X = iris_data.data
X
y = iris_data.target
y

test_X = np.array([[5.1, 3.6, 1.5, 0.3]])

linear_clf = LogisticRegression(random_state = 42, max_iter = 1000).fit(X, y)

linear_clf.predict(test_X)
linear_clf.predict_proba(test_X)

linear_clf.score(X, y)


```
